title: Sentry of Deceit: Roadstead
description: Hildegaard Streusselberg takes her self-appointed position as Commander and Chief of the Neighborhood Watch very seriously. Others see her as an unavoidable annoyance.There is something very odd about this community, though, something way beyond the scope of any one individual. A menacing force drives their purpose.Is there any such thing as fairness and justice, or will evil prevail? Is ignorance bliss, and do secrets protect?
author: Lee Ashe
